com.manheim.vim.services.vehicleimage.impl
Class UcmRidcConnectionManager

java.lang.Object
  com.manheim.vim.services.vehicleimage.impl.UcmRidcConnectionManager

public class UcmRidcConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object

UcmRidcConnectionManager.java - A singleton class responsible for maintaining a list of server details and returning a new connection handle to the next server in sequence. This makes sure that all server instances in a server group are load balanced.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Enterpulse
